Command.name: JavaScript
Command.label: 黄色注释
Command.tooltip: 黄色注释（本页最后修改）

Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: // default style var strokeColor = color.yellow; var opacity = 0.8; this.syncAnnotScan(); var annots = this.getAnnots(this.pageNum, ANSB_ModDate, true, ANFB_ShouldAppearInPanel); if (annots != null) { for (var i = annots.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (annots[i].type == "Highlight") { annots[i].opacity = opacity; annots[i].strokeColor = strokeColor; break; } } }
